title: What are the technologies used in the laundry mobile app? - Quora

response.answer_text: A laundry app has many features pertaining to the main 3 interfaces - User interfaceLaundryman interfaceDelivery man interfaceAll 3 interfaces must have separate features for which the below technologies, tools and languages are essential. Real-time analytics: – Apache Flink, IBM, Cisco, BigData, Spark, Hadoop Database: – Mail chimp integration, Cassandra, HBase, MongoDB, Postgress SMS:- Twilio, Nexmo Navigation:- Google Maps Payments:- Stripe, Braintree, PayPal, EWallets Cloud environment:- Google, Azure, AWS Push notifications:- Twilio Please feel free to get in touch with us at hello@green-apex.com if you want to have more insights into an app like this.
